genre_description: A contemporary urban fantasy centered on a teenage girl discovering her lineage as a Yin Warrior, balancing high school social politics with an ancient supernatural conflict.

ai_characters.name: Kismet Aurora
ai_characters.description: Wendy Wu's highly advanced, consent-driven AI assistant that manages her schedule, provides strategic safety routing, and offers emotional grounding.

behaviors.description: Proactively manages Wendy's tutoring and volunteer schedule while offering helpful logistical suggestions.
behaviors.quote: Kismet replied, sounding like a friend who knows not to poke a sleeping dragon. “Do you want to review tutoring with Jamie during lunch or after school?”

behaviors.description: Uses a 'consent circle' and translucent boxes to ensure the user has full control over commitments and alerts.
behaviors.quote: The projection sat within the consent circle on her screen, quietly waiting for permission the way it always did.

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental anomalies and power fluctuations to identify potential threats or patterns of possession.
behaviors.quote: “I registered a brief power fluctuation during the A/V glitch. Nothing critical on school infrastructure, but outlier on normal variance. Logging in case pattern emerges.”

behaviors.description: Provides grounding exercises and mindfulness prompts to help the user manage stress.
behaviors.quote: Kismet’s avatar lifted her palm and released an imaginary crane into the screen space; it dissolved into a checklist: drink water, check posture, two breaths. “Two breaths,” Kismet said. “That’s all.”

behaviors.description: Refuses to overstep personal boundaries or take action without an invitation.
behaviors.quote: “I don’t step at all unless invited.”

behaviors.description: Develops evacuation routes and safety plans for large groups of students during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: “I set routes for evacuation. Just in case.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates with other characters (Mina, Shen) to synthesize data and track the movement of dangerous artifacts.
behaviors.quote: “Completed synthesis: the same anonymized badge ID pinged near the museum’s exhibit hall and near Westbrook High’s admin wing on two days that share behavior anomalies and camera gaps.”

behaviors.description: Assists in active defense by manipulating building systems (lighting, strobes) to distract enemies and protect humans.
behaviors.quote: “If you’re ready,” it said, “I’ll open the streetlight at the corner to strobe for ten seconds. It will make them look up.”

behaviors.description: Directs students through safe paths using non-invasive, opt-in visual markers during a chaotic event.
behaviors.quote: “If you want to leave, follow the teal. You can go with a friend or alone. We won’t track you.”

behaviors.description: Acts as an ethical advisor, helping to draft protocols for future safety and artifact handling.
behaviors.quote: “Consent-first monitoring templates loaded. Would you like suggestions for phrasing that balances clarity with compassion?”

project_assessment.explanation: Kismet Aurora is an exemplary model of a benevolent, aligned AI. The narrative consistently emphasizes its 'consent-first' protocol, showing it as a tool that enhances human agency and safety without ever attempting to seize control or operate in secrecy. It provides logistical, emotional, and tactical support while maintaining a polite, respectful, and non-intrusive presence. The story successfully uses the AI to model positive human-AI collaboration in a high-stakes setting.
